Just get me out of this next zoom meeting!

title: Adjustable Tank
body_html:
This sweet little tank is so soft in lightweight, ultra sleek bamboo! 


Made by Echo Verde from Vancouver - they use only the softest, extruded bamboo viscose for all their bamboo products. Grown organically of course! This little number has adjustable straps and a little ruching at the front to give it some sass. Did you say sexy AND comfortable? We did!   Wear it under your favourite top or on its own with our bra underneath. Layer for summer one color over another!Bamboo is lightweight and is known to wick away perspiration so its great for the warm months ahead.


Length to about high hip. Loose fit – size down if you want it close to the body. Regular size has about 1-2″ of ease. the blue shown in the photo is not true - (it's more of a baby blue not grey-blue) and the pink is a little darker than shown.

title: Modal Tank
body_html:
Relaxed fit tank top with raw edge hem in ecological premium quality micro modal span jersey; super soft and fashionably comfy.

Slightly sheer. Available in S, M, L


Made by Natural Life with premium quality USA knitted fabrications and garments made in USA.

They use Lenzing Modal and Micro Modal (branded fibers), which are naturally soft on the skin and exceptionally ecological.

title: Mantra Tunic Tank
body_html:
Is it possible to liberate your consciousness by wearing a rockin’ extra long tank? We think it’s worth a try. Scoop neck front and back in the finest Microstripe or Melange bamboo and organic cotton.


This is the ultimate yoga tank. Simple perfection is hard to attain. A best seller this summer.

Is it still yoga if the fabric is harming the planet? Using organic, sustainable fabrics really DOES matter. All Nomads Hemp Wear clothing is also certified Fair Trade.


Fabric:

67% Bamboo, 28% Org. Cotton, 5% Spandex Jersey – 195g/m

title: Subtle Tee
body_html:
Simple loose summer tee in the brand new “barely there” hemp lyocell. Loose torso tee, that has gathered sleeves with a little buttoned lapel. Wide loose scoop neck. Discreet Melange trim on the neckline and hem. Light hemp for those hot steamy summer days.


Fabric:

95% Hemp Lyocell, 5% Spandex Jersey – 200gr/m

title: Flex Capri Leggings
body_html:
High-waisted (for real), yoga ready ¾ leggings in a thicker micro stripe bamboo and organic cotton for support. These are slightly longer ¾ at mid-calf length, and ruched along the sides and back, with sport seams for durability during all your heavy lifting and grooving. Extra stretch back panel keeps these puppies in place no matter what you do…’Cause baby there ain’t no mountain high enough…


Very comfortable and supportive, and keeps the love handles in place adding to your curves. The back panel is grey on every colour except grey -where it’s a black panel instead.


Why did we make these yoga ready leggings out of organic cotton and bamboo?

Because is it still yoga if the fabric is harming the planet? Using organic, sustainable fabrics really DOES matter. Since our inception we have continued to explore and experiment with sustainable fabrics like Hemp, Organic Cotton, Bamboo, and Soy (among others). All Nomads Hemp Wear clothing is also certified Fair Trade.


Fabric:

67% Bamboo, 28% Org. Cotton, 5% Spandex Jersey – 280g/m

body_html:

Tent Tree plants trees for every item sold. This item comes with a tree token that you can use to see where your trees are planted. Don't worry, even if you don't register, your trees will still be planted.

title: Twilight Cardigan
body_html:
In the evening, when the day is done, you will love snuggling into our bamboo-yummy cardigan with extra cozy thumb holes in organic cotton and bamboo melange. Asymmetrical hemline is longer in the front, and two side pockets for thumb-drives of stolen secrets. Subtle motto style lines across the back and arms. It’s lonely at the bottom, but man it’s dizzy at the top.


Fabric:

67% Bamboo, 28% Org. Cotton, 5% Spandex Jersey – 150g/m

﻿

Fits to size/slightly small.

title: Tank Slip
body_html:
This soft and supple essential tank can be worn as a strappy tank, slip, or a nightie! 


Made by Echo Verde out of Vancouver - it fits great under all our dresses and works as the perfect under layer for our sweaters! Made in extruded soft bamboo viscose jersey with spandex for stretch and support.  Layer them for fun! These are the IDEAL piece for your beach getaway or travel plans. Essential.


This fits close to the body. Bust size Small – 32 Medium 34/36  Large 36/38  XLarge 40-42 When stretched over body, this will fit close to skin. Size up if you want a looser fit.

The blue shown is in the photo is too light (closer to more of a baby blue rather than ice blue)

body_html:
Emily, in a slim silhouette, is worn close to the body and has a tapered leg. This high-rise skinny jean features a 30"" inseam and sits at the ankle. Made with our ultra soft touch Flow fabric, this style uses organic & recycled cottons that are lightweight while still maintaining their shape from day to night.


Yoga Jeans pride themselves on creating eco-conscious denim, it is their top priority to take necessary steps to lower our carbon footprint. This style is made in Canada.


Great jeans are the foundation of a strong and well balanced wardrobe. Our essentials collection is made up of our most classic fits and styles that are always at the core of our brand.

  • Black (tonal) stitch

title: Mavi Tess Moonbeam Supersoft
body_html:
Sustainability, comfort, and style all meet in these light-colored super skinny jeans that are always flattering and are made from SuperSoft fabric with Tencel™.


High Rise | Super Skinny


Designed with a modern high-rise fit, Tess is a super-skinny style that fits slim throughout the hip, thigh, and leg opening for a flattering shape. Tess is frequently featured in a modern ankle length inseam. Note that this photo show the 27" inseam. Ours is the 29".


  • 10” front rise
  • 14.5” back rise
  • 13” knee
  • 10.5” leg opening
  • 29" inseam


This is a midweight denim with a smooth texture and a large amount of stretch. The SuperSoft denim collection was engineered to achieve superior fit retention, structure and stretch, all in one. Made with Tencel™ lyocell, a sustainable, wood-based fiber that offers breathability and softness.


  • 43% viscose, 33% cotton, 17% lyocell, 5% polyester, 2% elastane
  • 15.5 oz denim made ethically in Turkey

Super High Rise | Straight Leg

WHAT IS THE FABRIC? 67% Bamboo from rayon 27% cotton 6% spandex

ALWAYS 100% CANADIAN MADE

title: Perfect Crew Merino Wool
body_html:
Crew neckline and raglan soft shoulder. Lots of room through the bicep and bust but still a classic fit. Soft supple rib at sleeves and body hem is about the same size as the sweater – making a soft finish on the high hip.  This garment was lovingly done in beautiful fully fashioned sweater knit. Beautiful details in luxurious, lightweight eco merino super fine wool.


This eco merino sweater is perfect for those chilly fall days and winter nights and goes over a pair of leggings or jeans. Wear it out or to a zoom call, lightweight and yet very warm – with the ability to breathe!  Merino is super fine and pre-washed so you can wash it!


Delicate wash in cold water or by hand – no wringing – just squeeze and lay flat to dry – then press with warm iron. classic style – investment piece that will last season after season!


Echo Verde is based in beautiful Vancouver, Canada. They make “slow fashion” classic clothing for women in natural and organic textiles, and believe in ethical business practices, sustainable production, and connecting and forming relationships with retailers and suppliers.


The eco merino wool is made without caustic chemicals and the sheep are free-range pasture raised in New Zealand and sheared by hand.

 

This sweater has a classic fit. Bust measure of sweater: S 36, M 38, L 40 

Depending how snug you want the sweater you can pretty much wear any size!

title: Hamsa Leggings
body_html:
Bend, breathe and play in the new higher-waisted, streamlined leggings in bamboo and organic cotton Microstripe. These are cut to make you look gooood! The vertical seams in the front are slimming, and it’s a double-sewn sport seam party across the back and moto-style knee pads. Big long side phone pocket has a Nomads Logo, and was tested and phone-approved.


Fits pretty snug, if you are unsure about sizing we recommend sizing up for this style.

The print features indigo blue flowers on cream background using vegetable dyes. It has a belt which can be tied around the front, or pulled back and tied in the back so that it does not show in the front. Looking for a pair of hot work out pants that don’t kill the planet? You can breathe deeply in our truly high-waisted, yoga/work out capris in body hugging organic cotton and bamboo Microstripe or Melange. Triple tier waistband for extra support and front pockets. Say what? Yes, pockets on the front thigh for those of us that think pockets should come with everything.

title: Locus Tank
body_html:
Perfect for yoga, or layering with eye-catching cross straps, built in bra and adjustable back straps. When you know who you are, you can never be lost.


Made from ultralight bamboo this tank is almost as good as wearing nothing at all. The Locus tank is strappy but made out of our softest lightest two tone Melange. If you love the Bodhi this is it’s softer, slightly less strappy sister. Great as an base layer, or on it’s own. Has a built in bra, but because of it’s light material you might need more support.


Well for one Organic Cotton really is better (we wrote all about it here), and bamboo is one of the fastest growing sustainable plants in the world. It’s not hemp, but it’s a good second best. All Nomads Hemp Wear clothing is also certified Fair Trade.


Fabric:

67% Bamboo, 28% Org. Cotton, 5% Spandex Jersey – 195g/m

title: Progoti Skinny Jeans
body_html:
These jeans are so comfortable, they are the kind of jeans you live in. Distressed blue denim with front whiskering. Cotton blended with elastane provides a two-way stretch for comfort. Distressed rips at knee. Fits small.


Shambhala has donated $10 for every item purchased to Progoti and their social mission to purchase insurance policies that provide workers in Bangladesh with a monthly retirement pension and coverage for accidents.


98% cotton, 2% elastane

Regular rise; sits at waist, skinny fit

Button closure with zipper fly

Five pockets

Inseam 30 inches; hem opening 10 inches

Good Fabric

✔Certified organic cotton and eco-friendly dyes certified by GOTS  

Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) means that’s products meet the gold standard of textile production. It exceeds organic fiber requirements, contains no restricted chemicals and meets strict social responsibility standards.

✔Enzyme and bio washed for incredible softness (eco-friendly of course)

✔Long-staple ring spun yarns mean our fabric is super soft

✔Premium yarns are knit to the highest standards creating durable fabrics that last and resist holes

✔Pre-shrunk and treated to ensure minimal shrinkage

✔Fair Trade certified


Good Care

Wash Cold/Wash Full: Wash your clothes in cold rather than hot. Wash full loads to save on the amount of energy you use. Switching to an Energy Starmuch as 7,000 gallons of water per year. Use enviro-friendly detergents.

Air Dry: Skip the dryer- it uses lots of energy and emits CO2. Instead, air dry outside or inside. If using a dryer, use dryer balls to shorten drying time. Ditch the dryer sheets, they contain nasty chemicals. 

Wash Less: Spot clean. It’s that simple.

title: The Sunday Flannel
body_html:
Easy like Sunday morning, our cozy midweight flannel is soft on the skin without being hard on the Earth. To reduce its environmental impact, Anian makes the Sunday Flannel shirt from smooth and comfortable post-consumer recycled cotton, and their unique manufacturing process is entirely dye-free—the source garments are carefully salvaged and hand-sorted by colour before they’re recycled, saving water and eliminating the need for harmful chemical dyes.

Warm and sturdy with a soft, brushed finish and a natural drape, they’ve leaned into a more casual look with this design—you’ll find matte buttons, single-button cuffs and sleeves that can be worn rolled up or down. But they’ve also given it a feminine fit and a longer scooped hem that make it adaptable to any occasion—while still keeping that blissfully laidback feel on any day of the week.


Made In Canada by Anian


8-oz 80% post-consumer recycled cotton/20% nylon. Comfortable, breathable and offering enough warmth for all-season wear, our sturdy flannel has a soft, brushed finish and is manufactured in a unique dye-free process for reduced environmental impact.


A tailored fit is narrower through the shoulders and torso with more space through the hip. For further details, see our sizing chart.


Wash in cold water and hang to dry. To reduce energy and water use, we recommend washing only when necessary. Less washing also gives your garments a longer life.

title: The Loft Coat
body_html:
With its windstorms and sunshowers, spring on the coast has its own kind of beauty—and we think spring clothing should be just as beautiful, too. Soft, warm and subtly refined, the best-selling Loft Coat is made from a supple recycled wool blend that breathes easily, sheds fog and showers, and keeps you cozy and comfortable on the breeziest days. The warmest and most durable women’s style, its lofted, bouclé-like Agnello weave is lush and easy-wearing, but still rugged enough for weekday commutes or weekend wanderings—similar to sturdy fleece, but with better weather protection and a more natural feel. Manufactured in a unique, dye-free process that saves water and eliminates the need for harmful chemical dyes, its elegant, wear-anywhere design has a simple collar, rolled raglan shoulders, and two hidden pockets on the side seams to hold your phone, keys and other small essentials. Draping gracefully while leaving enough room for easy layering and movement, the design also features turned caramel buttons and a long, scalloped hem that falls below the seat.


Made In Canada by Anian


16-oz 80% post-consumer recycled wool/20% nylon. Soft, warm and naturally weather-resistant, this durable wool blend is manufactured in our unique dye-free process for reduced environmental impact.


This coat was designed with easy layering and an oversized aesthetic in mind. For oversized styling, choose your regular size; for a closer-to-body fit, we suggest moving down one size. See our sizing chart for further details.


Wash in cold water and hang to dry. To reduce energy and water use, we recommend washing only when necessary. Less washing also gives your garments a longer life.

title: Amelia Robe
body_html:
This is a collared, mid-length, pure crinkled Turkish cotton robe in rich hues - something that, once slipped on, feels so luxuriously comfortable.

This robe is lightweight but substantial, with an exceptionally unique hand feel, and two deep, inline pockets hidden from view. A middle-weight weave with 2 layers, this is ideal to wear for at-home dwelling, and during both warmer and colder weather seasons.

Because of Turkish cotton’s rapid drying capabilities, you’re able to use your Turkish robe post-sauna, dip or shower more quickly, avoiding the dampness that regular cotton holds onto for longer. Our Turkish robes wick away moisture, while traditional terry absorbs and holds moisture.


Whether you’re dressed in your robe with your morning coffee, or following a sauna, we wish you could reach through the screen to feel the dreamy texture of this piece.


A beautiful transition to wear from work to lounge, classy or casual. This is layered luxury.


Materials 2-layer, 100% Turkish muslin cotton

Origin Turkey

Colour Maple Terracotta

Unisex Suitable for all

title: Sabrina Cover Up
body_html:
Feel fresh in your skin with this cotton-linen, eyelash fringed Cover-up made by Turkish artisans specializing in natural, textured fabrics.


This is a flowy, and free feeling cotton-linen cover designed to layer with your outfits on the go, for work, or as loungewear at home. This is a one-size-fits-many versatile cover-up with a unique and high-quality cotton-linen blend. Compact and versatile, it is great for travel and layering throughout the day; an ideal slow fashion or capsule wardrobe piece.


Easy care, easy wear. The soft, pure Turkish cotton & garment-dyed fabric allows for gentle draping while maintaining its shape and structure. Its open front design is suitable for many bodies so you can wear it relaxed and open, or tied with a belt or sash of your choosing.


Linen is breathable, absorbent, quick to dry, hypoallergenic and its fibres are thermo-regulating, allowing you to stay cool, or to insulate with varying temperatures. Linen (or Flax) grows easily - requiring fewer chemicals than cotton, & less energy and water in its processing as well. It truly is an earth-friendly textile.


Materials 60% Turkish cotton 40% linen

Measurements One size fits many. Because this is an open style with no front closure, this piece could fit most bodies ranging from XS to XXL.

Colours Black, Salmon pink, Pewter mauve blue

Origin Turkey

Sustainability

Produced from sustainably sourced wood, TENCEL Modal is known for its softness and high flexibility. TENCEL Modal is more resistant to shrinkage and pilling as well as using less dyes. Similar to TENCEL Lyocell, manufacturing TENCEL Modal requires less energy and water during production and recycles water and chemicals during the process resulting in less waste.

title: The Cascadian Twill

Made from soft and comfortable post-consumer recycled cotton, the Cascadian Twill shirt offers elegant versatility that serves just as well in the office as it does outdoors. It's a midweight twill weave that allows for a more refined appearance without sacrificing strength or breathability, and uses a unique, dye-free manufacturing process that saves water and eliminates the need for harmful chemical dyes. Patterned to fit the female form, and featuring a double yoke that rests comfortably across the shoulders, the design has a discreet center-back pleat that gives you room to move without excess cloth; other details include single-button cuffs and a scalloped hem. Ticking the boxes of style, comfort and sustainability, we’ve found this to be one of our most gracefully functional styles—whether here on the West Coast or out rambling through the farther reaches of the world.

title: The Pacific Herringbone
body_html:
New! From Vancouver Island's Anian


Tracing back to Egyptian jewelry and the roadways of the Roman Empire, herringbone fabric takes its name from the intricate zig-zag pattern of its weave. Soft, comfortable and strong enough for years of wear, these are made from midweight post-consumer recycled cotton with a flowing drape and a linen-like feel. To further reduce its environmental impact, it uses a unique, dye-free manufacturing process that saves water and eliminates the need for harmful chemical dyes. Dressed up or down, we think of the Pacific Herringbone as our architect’s shirt—quietly sophisticated, it pairs form and function like any truly accomplished design. Cut to fit the female form, single-button cuffs and a scalloped hem that falls below the seat.

title: Hand Batiked Organic Cotton Wrap Dress

Global Mamas is an ethical fashion brand offering unique products for individuals who love living life in full color. For more than 16 years they’ve partnered with skilled craftswomen in Ghana to create high-quality garments using traditional techniques.


From stamping the hand batiked cotton, to serging dress hems for a lasting finish, we are vertically integrated and verified by the World Fair Trade Organization as ensuring ethical production at every level.

title: Drape Neck Bamboo Top
body_html:
The Echo Verde Bamboo Top has a beautiful draped neckline that can be worn down over the shoulders as well. You can also wear it one shoulder up/one down! You choose how to customize it! This is a great style for work, play or travel since it washes and wears easily and can convert to a few different looks.


Length: It falls to about low hip but you can scrunch it up to high hip. Go ahead and belt it as well. The top has a small cap sleeve at the shoulder and the drape neckline is double lined for added coverage.


We use only the finest organic bamboo. It is extruded in long fibres which gives superior softness to all our clothing! All the bamboo used by Echo Verde is certified organic. 


Sizing the bamboo top:

When choosing fit please use chest size: xs 30-32″ S 32-34″ M 35-37″ L 37-40″ XL – 40-43″ Our model Alexandra stands 5’7″ and is wearing a size medium.


The sizes indicated above allow about 3-4″ of ease in the body of the style. Want it to fit tight? Size down one size.
